alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:09PM CDT until July 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Western Stephenson County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 808 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nora to Scales Mound, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Freeport, Lena, Stockton, Warren, Pearl City, Woodbine, Scales Mound, Apple River, Winslow, Nora, Schapville, Massbach, Loran, Kent, Eleroy, Damascus, Lake Le-Aqua- na State Park, Apple River Canyon State Park, Stockton Airport and Elmoville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
